        public void increaseNumberOfSkulls()
        Increase by one the number of skulls of this player, that represent the number of times he/she has died. WARNING: this has to be done only after scoring the damage line of this player

      • hasEnoughAmmo

        public boolean hasEnoughAmmo(java.util.List<AmmoType> ammoToSpend)
        Check if the player can spend the required quantity of ammo, also considering the possibility to discard powerups using them as ammo to pay part of all of the cost
        Parameters:
        ammoToSpend - - the specified quantity of ammo
        Returns:
        true if the player can spend that ammo, false otherwise

      • pay

        public void pay(java.util.List<AmmoType> ammoToSpend,
                java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUpsToSpend)
        Discard the indicated ammo and/or powerups. The parameters can be empty lists but not null. Throw exception if one of the parameters is null.
        Parameters:
        ammoToSpend -
        powerUpsToSpend -
